snippets.name: Send DM (detailed)
snippets.text:
Hi {cursor},

I’m Bhushan Alhat, a recent graduate with experience as a Full Stack Developer. I’m interested in exploring opportunities at [Company]. I’ve interned at Living Things, where I worked with Node.js and React, and developed projects like a video streaming platform.

You can check out my GitHub here: https://github.com/rashmod/ . I’ve attached my resume for your review.

Thank you for your time!

Best,
Bhushan

snippets.name: Resume Full
snippets.text:
Bhushan Alhat
alhatbhushan@gmail.com ⬧ 8828477708 ⬧ Mumbai, Maharashtra
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/bhushan-alhat/ ⬧ GitHub: github.com/rashmod

WORK EXPERIENCE

Granular
Nov. 2024 – Present
Full Stack Developer
Remote

Rebuilt the 2D CAD-style roof measurement tool, replacing legacy tool and third-party SaaS solutions; implemented snapping, roof facet detection, and exports (XML, JSON, XLSX, PDF) for inspection workflows.
Implemented advanced algorithms for the 2D measurement tool, including Tarjan’s bridge-finding, DCEL construction, face-walking, signed area classification, and BFS/DFS, enabling accurate detection of roof facets and convex hull for Ground Control Points.
Developed a 3D roof modeling prototype in Three.js with a composition-driven architecture, supporting hip and gable roofs with interactive drag, resize, and automatic constraint-based geometry updates.
Led Estimates V2 and Quick Estimate workflows, enabling CSV/PDF exports for estimates and Statement of Loss; added user-specific pricing preferences for personalized cost calculations, collaborated with sales and onsite teams to improve calculation accuracy.
Built CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes cron jobs, email notifications, and geospatial utilities.

Living Things
Oct. 2023 – Apr. 2024
Full Stack Developer Intern
Mumbai, Maharashtra

Conducted scoping and technical feasibility analysis for the development of an internal operations dashboard.
Collaborated with the operations team to gather requirements, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Implemented backend functionalities using Node.js, enabling seamless integration and data management for improved monitoring of onsite devices.
Utilized React for the frontend to create an intuitive user interface, addressing specific operational needs.
Wrote MongoDB queries and designed aggregations to visualize and analyze data


PROJECTS

Streamline
Live link | GitHub link

React | TypeScript | Node.js | Express | PostgreSQL | AWS | Docker | Kafka
Developed a full-stack video streaming platform with user registration, video uploads, and adaptive bitrate streaming.
Architected a microservices-based backend, enabling scalable video processing.
Implemented video transcoding pipeline with Kafka to handle concurrent uploads efficiently.
Ensured secure media storage and delivery using AWS S3 and CloudFront.

SKILLS

React,Next.js,TypeScript,tRPC,Node.js,Express.js,Go,PostgreSQL,MongoDB,Docker,Kubernetes,AWS

EDUCATION

Datta Meghe College of Engineering (Mumbai University)
Graduated: May 2024
BE, Information Technology
Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra

8.3 GPA; Honors in AI and ML
Relevant Coursework: OOPs, Data Structure and Algorithms, DBMS, Operating Systems, Computer Network, Automata Theory
